thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Republican Regulator Who Blasted Dodd-Frank Rules to Step Down

author: Dave Michaels
title: Republican Regulator Who Blasted Dodd-Frank Rules to Step Down
text:
WASHINGTON—A Republican member of the Securities and Exchange Commission who was a frequent critic of post-crisis regulations and helped quash some rules embraced by Democrats plans to leave the agency in July.
Michael Piwowar said he intends to step down from the SEC on July 7, after serving nearly five years on the five-person commission. Mr. Piwowar’s departure would leave the agency with four commissioners, meaning some votes could be deadlocked if the SEC’s two Democrats oppose measures favored by Chairman Jay Clayton,...
